title: Jira API Create Issue Operation Response Schema
description: Schema representing the output of the create issue operation in Jira API

id.description: The ID of the created issue or subtask.

self.description: The URL of the created issue or subtask.

key.description: The key of the created issue or subtask.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the API response.

headers.description: HTTP headers of the API response.
